pageContext.claim: “I mean, look, I remember picking up before I announced for president, I picked up The New York Times and I said to somebody, ‘Boy, this paper is dead, look at it.’ The paper was dead. It was like a leaflet that you hand out at the supermarket, and now it’s a vibrant paper.”
pageContext.analysis: The New York Times has gained readership in the Trump era but it was not "like a leaflet' before his election.
